title: What is echolocation?

options.label: A
options.text: To convert vibrations into nerve impulses

options.label: B
options.text: To funnel sound waves into the ear canal

multiple-choice.question: How do bats differentiate relevant information from signal clutter?

options.label: B
options.text: By comparing information received in each ear

options.label: C
options.text: By emitting chirps of varying frequency patterns

options.label: A
options.text: To gauge the distance of an object

options.label: C
options.text: To create a mental map of the surrounding physical space

options.label: D
options.text: To differentiate relevant information from signal clutter
